hout success.

WARCWriter writer =3D new WA=
RCWriter (aint,dirs,prefix, suffix,compressed,WARCReader.DEFAULT_MAX_WARC_F=
ILE_SIZE,metadata);
And later

I recei=
ve per mets.xml file one WARC file but I would like to store all the mets.x=
